statements: SELECT id, bill_name, due_date, amount FROM bill_payments;
SELECT bill_name, amount FROM bill_payments WHERE due_date <= '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM bill_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, bill_name, amount FROM bill_payments ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT bill_name, amount FROM bill_payments WHERE bill_name LIKE '%water%';
SELECT * FROM bill_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT bill_name, amount FROM bill_payments WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY bill_name ASC, due_date DESC;
SELECT id, bill_name, due_date, amount FROM bill_payments WHERE due_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT bill_name, amount FROM bill_payments WHERE bill_name LIKE '%electric%' OR bill_name LIKE '%water%' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM bill_payments WHERE due_date < '2022-06-30' AND amount >= 500 ORDER BY due_date ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM bill_due_dates;
SELECT bill_id, due_date FROM bill_due_dates ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT b.bill_id, b.amount, d.due_date FROM bill_amounts b JOIN bill_due_dates d ON b.bill_id = d.bill_id;
SELECT b.amount, d.due_date FROM bill_amounts b JOIN bill_due_dates d ON b.bill_id = d.bill_id WHERE b.amount > 100;
SELECT b.amount, d.due_date FROM bill_amounts b JOIN bill_due_dates d ON b.bill_id = d.bill_id WHERE d.due_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM bill_due_dates ORDER BY due_date DESC, bill_id ASC;
SELECT bill_id, due_date FROM bill_due_dates WHERE due_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT bd.bill_id, bd.due_date, ba.amount FROM bill_due_dates bd JOIN bill_amounts ba ON bd.bill_id = ba.bill_id;
SELECT bd.bill_id, ba.amount FROM bill_due_dates bd LEFT JOIN bill_amounts ba ON bd.bill_id = ba.bill_id WHERE ba.amount > 1000;
SELECT bd.bill_id, SUM(ba.amount) AS total_amount FROM bill_due_dates bd JOIN bill_amounts ba ON bd.bill_id = ba.bill_id GROUP BY bd.bill_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM bills;
SELECT bill_name, amount FROM bills WHERE due_date = '2023-07-15';
SELECT user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT bill_name, due_date, amount FROM bills WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_name, amount_paid FROM users INNER JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id;
SELECT bill_name, due_date, amount FROM bills WHERE amount > 100.00 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT bill_name, due_date, amount FROM bills JOIN payments ON bills.id = payments.bill_id WHERE payments.amount_paid >= 50.00;
SELECT user_name, payment_date, amount_paid FROM users JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, amount FROM bills WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM recurring_entries WHERE recurring_type = 'monthly' ORDER BY time_interval DESC;
SELECT id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM payments WHERE amount_paid >= 100.00;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, amount FROM bills WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT r.time_interval, b.name FROM recurring_entries r JOIN bills b ON r.bill_id = b.id WHERE r.recurring_type = 'monthly';
SELECT p.payment_date, b.name, u.username FROM payments p JOIN bills b ON p.bill_id = b.id JOIN users u ON b.id = u.id WHERE u.email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT b.name, SUM(p.amount_paid) AS total_paid FROM bills b LEFT JOIN payments p ON b.id = p.bill_id GROUP BY b.name HAVING total_paid > 5000 ORDER BY total_paid DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number='123456789';
SELECT id, due_date, amount FROM BillPayments ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT entry_name, frequency FROM RecurringEntries WHERE last_processed < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory WHERE amount > 100 AND payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BillPayments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT entry_name, frequency FROM RecurringEntries WHERE last_processed < '2021-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory JOIN Customers ON PaymentHistory.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE amount >= 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, auto_payment FROM BillingSettings WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY customer_id;
